other_tests.findings: Induration at the site measured 12 mm in diameter.
Vitreous fluid showed a polymorphous cellular infiltrate.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT-guided Needle Biopsy of the Adrenal Gland
other_tests.findings: Areas of loosely organized, granulomatous inflammation with diffuse necrosis; abundant small, budding yeast forms detected.
Diffuse enlargement of both adrenal glands without discrete nodules; heterogeneous appearance.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up CT scan after 9 months showed reduction in the size of the adrenal lesions.

other_tests.procedure_name: Serum Analysis for Cortisol and Corticotropin
other_tests.findings: Cortisol levels of 17.1 μg/dL and 21.2 μg/dL; corticotropin levels high at both times.
18F-FDG avidity exclusively in the adrenal glands.
